title: Looking for T202 Cobb, Jennings, Cobb steals 3rd
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking for T202 Cobb, Jennings, Cobb steals 3rd
posts.post_content:
Have always loved this Hassan Triple folder card with the famous sliding Cobb surrounded by Cobb and Jennings on the end panels . There is a nice one in the REA auction that I am tracking but thought I might also check here to see if anyone might have a lower grade one they’d be willing to move.

Thx!

Jeff
